issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When I use the short cut try to toggle the block selection function, the studio seems nothing happened. Then I use Quick Access command and choose "Toggle Block Selection", it's nothing happened too.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio: Toggle Block Selection are not work with no error on Mac OS
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio build 4.1.0.201507071122
Titanium CLI: 4.0.1, 
Alloy: 1.6.2, 
Titanium SDK: 4.1.0.GA, 
Mac OS X Yosemite 10.10.4 
Java SDK 1.8.0_45

comments.body:
Hello [~ethancfchen],

We tested your issue in our environment.For Toggle back  We use the short cut try to toggle the block selection function, the studio is working as expected .Then We use Quick Access command and choose "Toggle Block Selection", it's also working.

*Test Environments:*

Mac OS X: 10.10.1,10.10.4
CLI Version                 = 4.0.1
Titanium SDK  Version        = 4.1.0.GA
alloy- 1.7.3

Steps:

1. open a .js file
2. Select  code
3.  Try short cut  command(command 7) or Quick Access command and choose "Toggle Block Selection" to toggle the block selection function
4. Selected area will be commented.


Thanks
